title: Riot Support wont reply to ticket. Account is being hacked.
body:
Short story

I am able to login to my account but i cannot change my password or email due to the fact my email was hacked and i connot recover from microsoft. A forum has posted my password on their site and multiple people have been logging into my account and its very frustrating. :(

Long story

I have had a ticket open for my issue for 4 days now. My main email associated with my league of legends account has been hacked and I am unable to recover it from microsoft because there is no support number I can call. I just want to be able to at least change the password to my account. I would really appreciate a reply because I have been playing on this account since season 2. I have spent a lot of money in rp on my account and I dont like having it be compromised by hackers. I have screenshots in my ticket and more details. Thank you.

Ticket number #23395386

replies.body:
I took a look at this and it looks like you received a reply from an account specialist not too long ago.

Let me know if you have any questions.
